Lesson 8: Visual Predictive Check (VPC)

Source: vignettes/lesson_8.Rmd
lesson_8.Rmd

Lesson 8: Visual Predictive Check (VPC)

In Lesson 8, we will demonstrate usage of RsNLME with the tidyvpc package to perform a Visual Predictive Check (VPC).


Live Office Hours Date: 12/14/2022 @10am EST

We will be holding a virtual office hour where users may ask questions to presenters about past webinar topics.

Join Office Hours


Webinar Overview

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

  • Executing a VPC run in RsNLME
  • Explore different binning and binless methods to compute VPC statistics in tidyvpc
  • Use the VPCResults Shiny App to parameterize a VPC from the GUI and generate corresponding R code for reproducibility in RStudio
  • Customize the resulting VPC plot using ggplot2
